lines.text: [Jughead and Archie are at the junkyard]
We had great times in High School before we graduated.
I wish we never did that.
I never forgot the night of the storm, Archie. I never forgot how I stood by and watched you chase after Veronica. How I never just went after what I wanted.
Something I always wanted to do with you, Archie. I'm sick of being Miss Goody-Two-Shoes. Make me a woman, Archie. Make... me... wild.

[after betty opens the closet door]
What are you doing here?
I was just going to ask you the same question.

[Betty and veronica look at the door then at each other]
I think we need to talk.
